search_parameters.q: Jimi Hendrix, age, music related skills + abilities + occupations, proficiency in each, and current residence location (city, state)

text_blocks.snippet: Jimi Hendrix was 27 years old at the time of his death. Because he is deceased, he does not have a current residence; however, he is interred at Greenwood Memorial Park in Renton, Washington. Facebook +3

list.snippet: Occupations: Primarily a musician, songwriter, singer, producer, and bandleader.

Electric Guitar (Master/Virtuoso): Widely considered one of the most influential guitarists in history. He revolutionized the instrument by popularizing feedback, distortion, and effects like the wah-wah pedal.
Songwriting (High Proficiency): Composed groundbreaking tracks such as "Purple Haze," "Voodoo Child," and "The Wind Cries Mary".
Vocals (Professional): Acted as the lead singer for the Jimi Hendrix Experience and Band of Gypsys.
Studio Innovation (Pioneer): He was a visionary in the recording studio, being the first to use stereophonic phasing effects.
Showmanship (Legendary): Known for high-energy performances, including playing the guitar with his teeth or behind his back, and famously setting it on fire at the Monterey Pop Festival. Wikipedia +8
Self-Taught: Hendrix was entirely self-taught and could not read music, instead learning by ear from radio and records.
Ambidexterity: Although naturally left-handed, he famously played right-handed guitars flipped upside down and restrung; he could also play right-handed without restringing.
Multi-instrumentalist: While best known for the guitar, he also played the bass, piano, and drums. Facebook +4

text_blocks.snippet: For more on his discography and archival footage, you can visit the Official Jimi Hendrix Website.
Would you like to know more about the specific equipment and gear Hendrix used to create his signature sound?
